
# Cardano Example Dapp

## **Scopes Demo**

    Script that will test and explore code scopes and inline scripting access reach


## Try it online: 

-  Visit [HTML5 Dapp](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GameChangerFinance/gamechanger.wallet/main/examples/Scopes%20Demo.html)
-  Run [Standalone URL dapp connection](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/api/2/run/1-H4sIAAAAAAAAA-1aWW_bRhD-K4RelABGTe4xK-atOdAacYsiQfsaUOTKVkuTKkmjCQL_987sQS5JSb7aukhiQSJ3d45vjqVWM_686LZdqRcvFu_zeqfb6LW-qhcni0K3ebPdddu6Mmt0H3WXWRf9tS3LqNNtF2VVEemPu7JudJTXhY5aK4Lmt1W5rWjGCKkuoizPddtGjc7yy--isw7v_rzeNkh-qT9mhc63V1kZ7Zq6q_O6jHSVrUtdRJu6cUKi62bbIrLu047g2kkcN7q7bqpf353_knWdbgjuZdftXpyelnWelZd1273gcRyfFmjZabbbnhbZbkeM10j7eXFR1uusfGek_IRW0JzTcZXlTe0pF59b3T1bXrd6oF2eLKu60svnN4ubk0WFTtGF9VUbiNle7eqm-7597yGPnfsScf4R1RvrQ-PjvK66bFu1ONKRZUdf0DpyZ81F-_LTW_2JVJy_-e3N-YcExZxVv-ucyNxURHQEa9PUV2PS-KNaM6YEpPjOQTLGM8YkBwlcScVwJhYapOK4LkGwGNc4zqcqVjjiCWMsJwkKZzy_CmnMOiQ4Voq79TUolCnYiql-RbFUFU4ao1WjXxMHYYQCNiB6DaEEhcg3gDogZxq5EL0MJAjP6TTg2-hQMpAuEAe-_XhsD-pOjEUbj8_zHrfFaRp5Y6_8FAocbVCuEInicu4_QTEYZpFj4xEIZuznsGYoAwA_ubOYKFdkmZvTZCPyasRo15Am1G5j3POPYieYSsUacaTeCpELiQxS5HKDobVoUDpkJn-ctAlVPOSC9Q8AeRaKY1J5rFZcAeP0QijoitRegeO9NPMcEnOV3M7hEidnoipHE3PEZO6VWROOTpg1y8cdPcmPDQ2tcW51M-A9BuVopvrVQTkDP_DErStDP-IHO29xEt_KSJ3z0Ajlg5hgYz1vbz8MGL0fAch_YOyf2XAQg7I-N3zWDhrjfnO6rO_lAQxipnNsg7kGdpjNsA-74U9cDJPZ-rH4GLsJt48RwMx_U72PicvYpsO5cWf8OE82mDUAh1fgKzHyD-dxmH-i3wf7aK0OmPlAGH_5-NOVmf1hx2DvOZ_E2Mtc9TEb0YHs42j1SufHkE86nv22h_t4rv_wvhOGP8W89PmazmIhgOik0yDNWJITJvtWOOwASfD8GWM7Live-1wI8wc49DkLMM-bu2LlxrcrgxDM2L-tV2xWpKOxlQIuwzw9N5iHseR8RAdu7DNTObpQTmx0QE_v6TyfmMgTAV-oj0_ke_xxIMfz-b_BdhiNPb2ayLnNfo_7Pnj26adRMuFXgfzD-mFEH_rT61sFWO-ix6-lTv4x3NP4hn4cxx_2-nGaj-D0gctAH__b43B_Pyge5vmgL4wH9PZCLy_MV69H8vv5QdzBzmNxGMb74zF8M9zV74N-nx_h-Db-h-6fId7e3_Yv9BcE9A-196n2y7E48cBeb-fUb4LPn4djewf9X1p8Qr94PrVn3vvRyx3Hb76_Q0ws4L9rPnj6ZDJeTXCEefEQPffJu9vyb3wNz0g2y1Iza88TqfndZE7yAC4DV_Z8Qfd49ni6M0bKw2c0TOZhtidip2tfjMIcC_F-KWcDwYfciHmYs0OOhGcqTy96fpjMQ_9MsvsZ-u8NT7dyVzmaBxdH6H3hcYe4brPv29njyzx7hPbcZ3_fd19_-26c5-HUr8DHuL_u70j6Lb6vnmNrEbZWI_rf_K6OxBWf_k7_9-pTPKip-HvudLh6Fbh5J4mZ9X11Ld7jGGowtrZ1mGd_LWxaD3NvW2FGl6WC6r6p0ELJDTpwJSR-rh9VAU5NBOy6q8wYNLHboyvuqzQA_111Vxhv2EqPreDEjzhxMX6oavQ1VYPVkXgfivX_Zjf2WMHJfuIdqYqhbwUb6lIJ6uRQz0s9qD9mO0_0SR1G6pNRvwqJWB70zjjJ ## Source code:

- dapp connection code: [GCScript](examples/Scopes%20Demo.gcscript)
- frontend + dapp connection code : [HTML5 dapp](examples/Scopes%20Demo.html)

Dapp code was autogenerated by [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground)

## GCScript code (dapp connection):
```json
{
  "title": "Scopes Demo",
  "description": "Script that will test and explore code scopes and inline scripting access reach. It requires hexadecimal protocol enabled for script uris",
  "type": "script",
  "returnURLPattern": "http://localhost:3000/demo/api/dapp",
  "run": {
    "globalReturnMode": {
      "type": "macro",
      "run": "{set('useReturnMode','none')}"
    },
    "nestedScripts": {
      "type": "importAsScript",
      "description": "Block of code that contains the imported code",
      "argsByKey": {
        "LEVEL_1": "Injected LEVEL_1 args"
      },
      "from": {
        "LEVEL_1": "",
        "SIBLING_CHECK_1": ""
      }
    },
    "scopeDebug": {
      "type": "macro",
      "run": "{console('log',get('cache'),get('args'))}"
    }
  }
}
```

## Run standalone QR dapp connection: 

You can use [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground) in `QR URL Transport` mode to capture results
